posts.post_title: Wtb: T206 mike powers in high grade
posts.post_content: Hoping for a psa 7 or sgc 84, will pay top dollar....thanks
An SGC 88 was just listed on the bay..:)
Thanks reg...i saw it and he has been listing it over and over on ebay for months. Starting bid of $6k!!! Lots of luck to him.....
